metadata.title: PM pays tribute to Shaheed Aitezaz Hasan for unmatched bravery in protecting schoolchildren

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 6 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Monday paid tribute to Shaheed Aitezaz Hasan who sacrificed his life to save his school and classmates from a devastating attack. aToday, we commemorate the martyrdom of Shaheed Aitezaz Hasan, a true son of the soil from district Hangu, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, whose extraordinary courage stands as a beacon of hope and resilience,a the prime minister said in a social media post on X. He noted that at just 15 years of age, Aitezaz displayed unparalleled bravery, valiantly sacrificing his life to shield his school and classmates from a devastating attack. aHis selflessness and unwavering resolve remind us of his lasting impact a single act of courage can have on countless lives,a the prime minister added. He emphasized that Aitezazas legacy will continue to inspire future generations.
content.summary: Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif paid tribute to Shaheed Aitezaz Hasan, a 15-year-old who sacrificed his life to save schoolchildren from an attack.
